## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

Describe the problem this feature would solve. Why do you need this feature?

**Example**: I'm always frustrated when [...]

## Proposed Solution

Describe your proposed solution. How should this feature work?

## Alternative Solutions

Have you considered any alternative solutions or features? Please describe them.

## Use Case

Describe how you (or others) would use this feature.

## Benefits

Who would benefit from this feature? How would it improve the project?

- [ ] End users of the application
- [ ] Developers working on the project
- [ ] System administrators deploying the application
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Implementation Considerations

If you have technical knowledge, describe any implementation details:

- Frontend changes needed?
- Backend changes needed?
- New dependencies required?
- Performance implications?
- Security considerations?

## Mockups or Examples

If applicable, add mockups, sketches, or examples from other applications.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, links, or references about the feature request here.

## Willingness to Contribute

- [ ] I am willing to work on this feature myself
- [ ] I can provide feedback during development
- [ ] I can test this feature when it's ready
